items.title: Blenders Pride
items.description: A premium whiskey brand that is favored by many.

items.title: Royal Stag
items.description: One of the best-selling whiskey brands in India.

items.title: Officer's Choice
items.description: Known for its affordability and widespread consumption.

items.title: McDowell’s No.1
items.description: A highly popular brand known for its smooth taste.

items.title: Kingfisher
items.description: The most widely consumed beer in India, known for its light and refreshing taste.

items.title: Haywards 5000
items.description: A strong beer brand that is popular in many parts of India.

items.title: Bira 91
items.description: A trendy craft beer that has gained popularity for its distinct taste and branding.

items.title: Simba
items.description: Another popular craft beer brand that has a growing fan base in urban areas.

items.title: Old Monk
items.description: An iconic Indian dark rum known for its rich flavor.

items.title: McDowell’s No.1 Celebration
items.description: A popular rum brand enjoyed across the country.

items.title: Hercules
items.description: Known for its strong taste and popular among defense personnel.

items.title: Bacardi
items.description: While an international brand, it is widely consumed in India, especially for cocktails.

items.title: Magic Moments
items.description: A leading vodka brand in India known for its variety of flavors.

items.title: Romanov
items.description: A popular choice among vodka drinkers for its affordability.

items.title: White Mischief
items.description: Known for its smoothness and wide range of flavors.

items.title: Smirnoff
items.description: An international brand that is very popular in India.

items.title: Chicken Biryani
items.description: Aromatic basmati rice cooked with tender chicken pieces and Indian spices.

items.title: Mutton Biryani
items.description: Flavorful basmati rice cooked with succulent mutton and a blend of spices.

items.title: Vegetable Biryani
items.description: A healthy mix of vegetables and basmati rice cooked with fragrant spices.

items.title: Prawn Biryani
items.description: Juicy prawns cooked with basmati rice and aromatic spices.

items.title: Plain Rice
items.description: Steamed basmati rice.

items.title: Jeera Rice
items.description: Basmati rice cooked with cumin seeds.

items.title: Fried Rice
items.description: Stir-fried rice with vegetables and soy sauce.

items.title: Egg Fried Rice
items.description: Fried rice with scrambled eggs and vegetables.

items.title: Hakka Noodles
items.description: Stir-fried noodles with vegetables and soy sauce.

items.title: Chicken Noodles
items.description: Noodles stir-fried with chicken pieces and vegetables.

items.title: Schezwan Noodles
items.description: Spicy stir-fried noodles with vegetables.

items.title: Egg Noodles
items.description: Noodles stir-fried with scrambled eggs and vegetables.

items.title: Espresso
items.description: A strong and bold coffee brewed by forcing hot water through finely-ground coffee beans.

items.title: Cappuccino
items.description: A classic coffee made with espresso and steamed milk, topped with a layer of frothy milk.

items.title: Latte
items.description: A creamy coffee made with espresso and steamed milk, often flavored with syrups.

items.title: Mocha
items.description: A rich and indulgent coffee made with espresso, steamed milk, and chocolate syrup.

items.title: Butter Chicken
items.description: Tender chicken pieces cooked in a rich and creamy tomato-based sauce.

items.title: Paneer Butter Masala
items.description: Cottage cheese cubes cooked in a creamy and spiced tomato gravy.

items.title: Dal Makhani
items.description: A rich and creamy lentil dish made with black lentils and kidney beans.

items.title: Chicken Curry
items.description: Chicken cooked in a flavorful and spicy curry sauce.

items.title: Naan
items.description: Soft and fluffy Indian flatbread, typically made in a tandoor oven.

items.title: Roti
items.description: Unleavened whole wheat flatbread.

items.title: Paratha
items.description: Layered flatbread, often stuffed with various fillings like potatoes or paneer.

items.title: Bhatura
items.description: Deep-fried puffed bread, often served with chickpea curry.

items.title: Samosa
items.description: Deep-fried pastry filled with spiced potatoes and peas.

items.title: Pakora
items.description: Vegetable fritters coated in a spiced gram flour batter and deep-fried.

items.title: Aloo Tikki
items.description: Spiced potato patties, often served with chutney.

items.title: Chaat
items.description: A popular street food snack made with a variety of ingredients like potatoes, chickpeas, and chutneys.

items.title: Gulab Jamun
items.description: Deep-fried milk-based dumplings soaked in a sugar syrup.

items.title: Rasgulla
items.description: Soft and spongy cheese balls soaked in a light sugar syrup.

items.title: Jalebi
items.description: Crispy and syrupy spiral-shaped dessert made from a fermented batter.

items.title: Kheer
items.description: Rice pudding made with milk, rice, and sugar, flavored with cardamom and garnished with nuts.

items.title: Chicken Tandoori
items.description: Marinated chicken cooked in a tandoor oven, served with lemon and onions.

items.title: Paneer Tikka
items.description: Cottage cheese cubes marinated in spices and grilled in a tandoor oven.

items.title: Tandoori Roti
items.description: Whole wheat flatbread cooked in a tandoor oven.

items.title: Fish Tikka
items.description: Marinated fish fillets grilled in a tandoor oven.

items.title: Dosa
items.description: A thin and crispy crepe made from fermented rice and lentil batter.

items.title: Idli
items.description: Steamed rice cakes, typically served with sambar and chutney.

items.title: Vada
items.description: Deep-fried savory doughnuts made from lentil batter.

items.title: Uttapam
items.description: Thick and savory pancakes topped with vegetables.

items.title: Pani Puri
items.description: Hollow puris filled with spicy and tangy flavored water.

items.title: Bhel Puri
items.description: A mixture of puffed rice, vegetables, and tangy tamarind sauce.

items.title: Sev Puri
items.description: Crispy puris topped with sev, potatoes, chutneys, and onions.

items.title: Aloo Chaat
items.description: Spicy and tangy potato chaat garnished with chutneys and coriander.

items.title: Chicken Seekh Kebab
items.description: Minced chicken mixed with spices and grilled on skewers.

items.title: Mutton Kebab
items.description: Spiced minced mutton grilled on skewers.

items.title: Hara Bhara Kebab
items.description: Vegetarian kebabs made with spinach, peas, and potatoes.

items.title: Paneer Kebab
items.description: Cottage cheese cubes marinated in spices and grilled.

items.title: Dal Tadka
items.description: Yellow lentils cooked with spices and tempered with ghee and cumin.

items.title: Chana Dal
items.description: Split chickpeas cooked with spices and tempered with ghee.

items.title: Masoor Dal
items.description: Red lentils cooked with onions, tomatoes, and spices.

items.title: Ladoo
items.description: Sweet round balls made from gram flour, ghee, and sugar.

items.title: Barfi
items.description: Sweet fudge made from condensed milk and flavored with cardamom.

items.title: Peda
items.description: Sweet round discs made from condensed milk and flavored with saffron.

items.title: Sandesh
items.description: Bengali sweet made from fresh paneer and flavored with cardamom.

items.description: A platter with a variety of vegetarian dishes, bread, rice, and dessert.

items.description: A platter with a variety of non-vegetarian dishes, bread, rice, and dessert.

items.description: A traditional Gujarati meal with a variety of vegetarian dishes.

items.title: Rajasthani Thali
items.description: A traditional Rajasthani meal with a variety of vegetarian dishes.

items.description: Spicy mashed vegetable curry served with buttered bread rolls.

items.description: Spicy potato fritter sandwiched in a bread roll, served with chutneys.

items.description: A mixture of puffed rice, vegetables, and tangy tamarind sauce.
